text: Aldo Pastore (15 December 1930 â€“ 26 July 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy from 1979 to 1987. Pastore was born in Savona, Italy. Pastore died on 26 July 2022 in Savona at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Liguria Category:People from Savona
title: Aldo Pastore
